name: The treasures of captain Mitch.
description:
A small game for the 10th alakajam where you are a pasifist pirate having found a book with treasure maps and clues!

Move: WASD

Diging: E

Get on/off of the boat: E

Respawn the boat: R

note: A PDF file with maps and hints is int the .zip.
